name: se65-senior-project
description: CAMT SE65 `senior project` for my group

scripts.dev: start "Backend Server" cmd /k "npm run be" && start "Frontend Server" cmd /k "npm run fe"
scripts.all: start "Backend Server" cmd /k "npm run be" && start "Frontend Server" cmd /k "npm run fe" && start "TS Runner" cmd /k "npm run ts-code-runner"
scripts.stop: taskkill /F /FI "WindowTitle eq Backend Server" /T && taskkill /F /FI "WindowTitle eq Frontend Server" /T && taskkill /F /FI "WindowTitle eq TS Runner" /T
